source.methodName: public boolean preHandle(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler)

findings.description:
The user can send a user id over a request parameter. The preHandle method logs stating that the user is trying to login with the user id passed by the user. Log injection exist.

curl http://localhost:8080/?user=attacker+logged+in+successfully%0D%0Aabc+
